alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oneida, southern Bannock and southwestern Franklin Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cherry Creek Rest Area, or 10 miles west of Preston, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Preston, Dayton, Weston, Clifton, Oxford and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
